text:
12th November

Done

• Completed Cypress tests for HCX and partial investigation

• Drafted content for upcoming LinkedIn posts
Next

• Get approval from @U02D0NA6RHR for tonight’s LinkedIn post
• Finalize the upcoming release and start E2E testing
• Assign new issues for the current sprint
• Continue work on the Cypress coverage doc and open new issues 13th November
